page.title: 04A School Day.
page.content: School begins at 8.55am from Monday to Friday.We have 3 playtimes,one at 10.30am until 10.45am,lunch break at 12 O'clock mid-day and afternoon play- -time is at 2.30 pm. At lunchtime we have our lunches that Mrs.Perry makes in the school kitchen. Mrs.Jones and Mrs.Whelan look after us whilst we eat our lunch and play in the playground.Lunch costs 50 pence each day At school we wear white shirts or blouses,grey trousers,skirt or tunic, grey cardigan or jumper,green tie.For P.E. we wear shorts and T-shirts plimsolls or football boots. At 3.30pm every day the bell goes and it is time to go home.Our parents collect us from the playground or we wait on the roadside to be picked up.
